text: Rage farming is a general term for when someone purposely tries to make someone else Angry or Upset. This can be done in the physical or Digital world. Often times, rage farming is done by making cruel Jokes about someone or something repeatedly. Rage farming can also be referred to as Rage baiting. On the internet, rage farming can be through spreading Memes about something very sensitive or offensive to a wide group of people. On a Video game rage farming can be seen as calling someone else's skills trash or any other terms for bad. == References == Category:Internet slang
title: Rage farming
